name: Relocate
description: Relocate a Tennant to any room they can afford.

name: Evict
description: Send a Tennant back to the docks.

name: New Tennant
description: Welcome a Tennant from the docks into any room they can afford.

name: Repair
description: Remove a problem from one of your rooms.

name: Sabotage
description: Remove an ammenity from one of your rival's rooms.

name: Arson!
description: Remove one of your rival's rooms. All Tennants are sent to the ropes. If there isn't room, the tennant is sent to the docks.

name: Pay Up
description: Collect rent immediately from one of your Tennants.

name: Taxes
description: Choose one of your rivals who has to pay $5 to the bank.

name: Slum Tourists
description: Collect $3 from the bank as payment for your attraction.
